title: Latitude bounds order swapped
description:
The order of the bounds in the latitude coordinate has been swapped over. For example, they are:

 lat_bnds =
  -88.8206155255893, -90,
  -87.8906536323674, -88.8206155255893,

rather than:

 lat_bnds =
  -90, -88.8206155255893,
  -88.8206155255893, -87.8906536323674,

Some tools will struggle to open these files. The files will be retracted, corrected and then re-published.
